VASA.preprocessing.prep.get_year_week(date)[source]¶

Gets the week number of date (starting on monday). :param date: Date to convert :type date: date

Returns

A tuple of (year, week_number)

Return type

tuple

VASA.preprocessing.prep.group_data(data, cols, date_col='', group_col='fips', by='week', date_format='%Y-%m-%d')[source]¶

Groups data by date to iterate over later.

Parameters
datadataframe

Must include a date and grouping column along with variables of interest

colsstr | List[str]

Column names for the variables of interest

date_colstr

Column name containing dates

group_colstr

Column name of grouping, i.e. fips code

by: ‘week’ | ‘day’, optional

How to group data, default: week.

Returns
dataframe

Dataframe grouped by date
